SELECT DISTINCT d.id,
dd.name dishName, d.price price, s.name sizeName, s.remark remark, t.name taste, c.name dishType, dd.inventory inventory FROM dish d
JOIN dish_detail dd on d.id = dd.id
JOIN size s ON dd.size_id = s.id
JOIN taste t ON dd.taste_id = t.id
JOIN category c ON d.category_id = c.id
WHERE dd.inventory != 0 AND d.status != 0
AND c.id = #{id};
